trans-unit.target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000010_KRILE<tab>Erenville!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000020_ERENVILLE<tab>Apologies for the wait. I hope I haven't called you away from anything important.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000030_ERENVILLE<tab>I chanced upon some commissioned items at my destination, so I thought I might deliver them.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000040_GRAHATIA<tab>Where did you go, if I may ask?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000050_ERENVILLE<tab>The New World─Tural.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000060_KRILE<tab>You went to Tural!? Then the person who you wished to introduce...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000070_ERENVILLE<tab>Aye, she hails from there. I present to you...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000080_GRAHATIA<tab>...It seems you've lost her.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000090_KRILE<tab>Did she wander off?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000100_ERENVILLE<tab>[SIGH] (REPORT IF DISPLAYED)
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000110_WUKLAMAT<tab>(-Exuberant Newcomer-)Sorry, sorry! It's just so different here─I can't help but want to explore!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000120_ERENVILLE<tab>Well, while you were exploring, your candidate came to us.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000130_ERENVILLE<tab>This is <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>. The adventurer you crossed the seas to meet.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000140_WUKLAMAT<tab>(-Exuberant Newcomer-)Ooh... You weren't exaggerating. It's plain <var 08 E905 ((she's)) ((he's)) /var> no ordinary <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000150_WUKLAMAT<tab>I'm Wuk Lamat. Claimant to the throne of Tuliyollal.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000160_KRILE<tab>Tuliyollal...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000170_ERENVILLE<tab>It's Tural's governing nation. The capital bears the same name.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000180_WUKLAMAT<tab>I'll get to the point. I want you to come with me to my homeland.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000190_ERENVILLE<tab>Given the magnitude of the request, perhaps you should explain why you're making it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000200_WUKLAMAT<tab>Hahaha! Of course, of course!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000210_WUKLAMAT<tab>Soon an event of great import will be held in Tural: the rite of succession.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000220_WUKLAMAT<tab>Taking the form of a contest, it will determine who next ascends the throne.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000230_WUKLAMAT<tab>As daughter to its present keeper, I will participate─and I have every intention of winning.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000240_WUKLAMAT<tab>I was searching for champions to join me when Erenville told me about you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000250_WUKLAMAT<tab>A mighty warrior who knows no fear! Who sweeps aside terrible fiends as if they were reeds! Who flew to the edge of existence and saved our star!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000260_ERENVILLE<tab>She asked who Eorzea's greatest hero was, and so I told her. Much more elegantly, I might add.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000270_WUKLAMAT<tab>Now you know why. You'll come to Tural, yes?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000280_GRAHATIA<tab>Wait! Let's all just...slow down.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000290_GRAHATIA<tab>Wuk Lamat, was it? You claim to be of the royal family, but is it not the Mamool Ja who rule in Tural?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000300_WUKLAMAT<tab>Tuliyollal is a nation of many peoples. Not only the Mamool Ja as some across the seas are quick to assume.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000310_WUKLAMAT<tab>That said, its present ruler is a Mamool Ja, and one blessed with two heads besides.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000320_WUKLAMAT<tab>He's also my father. Not by blood, obviously, but he raised me as his own, and that's what matters.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000330_GRAHATIA<tab>So that is the way of it... My apologies if I was indelicate.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000340_WUKLAMAT<tab>Hardly! I know little about your land, and nothing about your parentage.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000350_WUKLAMAT<tab>Ah, but in my eagerness I've gotten ahead of myself. I can't expect you to agree on the spot when we've only just met.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000360_WUKLAMAT<tab>If you have any questions, I'll do my best to answer them. Just know, though, that if it's adventure you seek, you could do far worse than come with me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000370_WUKLAMAT<tab>Now, this is only a rumor...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000380_WUKLAMAT<tab>But apparently, the contest will involve the fabled city of gold and the legendary beast Valigarmanda.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000390_WUKLAMAT<tab>Tell me that doesn't pique your interest.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You have my complete attention.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>This is strictly a rumor, nothing more?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Golden city... I've heard about it before.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000400_WUKLAMAT<tab>We're going to get along, you and I!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000410_WUKLAMAT<tab>Tural has no shortage of unexplored frontiers and deadly fiends. You'll never want for excitement, I promise you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000420_WUKLAMAT<tab>Well, the details of the contest have yet to be announced.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000430_WUKLAMAT<tab>But the rumors come from someone involved in the preparations, so I'd say there's more than a grain of truth to them.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000440_WUKLAMAT<tab>So the tales have reached even these shores! I can't help but feel proud!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000450_ERENVILLE<tab>I advise you not to put much store by these rumors. Golden cities are naught but a dreamer's fancy.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000460_WUKLAMAT<tab>Says the dreamer who was bent on finding one when he was a child. Just because you failed doesn't mean it doesn't exist.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000470_KRILE<tab>Tuliyollal and the golden city... Just like in the letter to Grandfather.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000480_WUKLAMAT<tab>Regardless of what the contest may entail, it'll be no simple thing. If I'm to triumph, I'll need capable and dependable companions.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000490_WUKLAMAT<tab>So let's go on a hunt together! There's no better way to get acquainted!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000500_ERENVILLE<tab>From here, we must walk.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000510_WUKLAMAT<tab>So much ice... It rivals even Yok Tural.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000520_WUKLAMAT<tab>Ooh, a white bear! I wonder what it tastes like...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000530_ERENVILLE<tab>Remember, we're here to deal with creatures that have been deemed an unacceptable danger. Do not attack anything else unprovoked.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000540_WUKLAMAT<tab>I know, I know.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000550_WUKLAMAT<tab>So this is the isle where aether literally bursts forth!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000560_ERENVILLE<tab>Aye, the Isle of Haam. The geysers lie deep inland, however.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000570_WUKLAMAT<tab>You really are knowledgeable. Koana told me nothing about this place.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000580_ERENVILLE<tab>I doubt your brother managed to come out this way. He's like to have toured facilities like Labyrinthos, however.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000590_WUKLAMAT<tab>The great big cavern under the city? It's amazing that they could make a sky down there, complete with a sun.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000600_GRAHATIA<tab>This brother of yours... He has been to Sharlayan?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000610_WUKLAMAT<tab>He has. Koana's my second older brother, and until recently, he was a student in the city.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000620_WUKLAMAT<tab>He went on and on about “technological amusements.” It made me want to come here too one day.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000630_WUKLAMAT<tab>And so I did. I think I understood something of how he felt when I set foot in his beloved Studium.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000640_GRAHATIA<tab>He went to the Studium? Your brother must be quite a scholar.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000650_GRAHATIA<tab>But I wonder... Like you, he'd be royalty, yes? Such a personage coming to Sharlayan to receive an education would surely have caused a stir, yet I recall nothing of the sort...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000660_WUKLAMAT<tab>He consulted with the head of the Studium beforehand, that his identity might remain secret.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000670_WUKLAMAT<tab>Being Miqo'te, he had no trouble blending in. He's adopted like me, you see.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000680_WUKLAMAT<tab>One time, though, he almost let it slip to a professor. It was all he could do to parry the barrage of questions.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000690_GRAHATIA<tab>Having no shortage of questions myself, I can imagine.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000700_WUKLAMAT<tab>Ask whatever you like. I don't mind. But I maintain hunting together is the best way to get to know someone.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000710_ERENVILLE<tab>The researchers should be up ahead. Let's find them and learn what we can.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000720_WUKLAMAT<tab>Powerful wings and razor-sharp talons... Worthy prey!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000730_WUKLAMAT<tab>What is that thing!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000740_GIANTCOLIBRI<tab>Squawk! What is that thing!? What is that thing!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000750_WUKLAMAT<tab>It...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000760_WUKLAMAT<tab>It speaks!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000770_GRAHATIA<tab>It's heading towards the falls!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000780_ERENVILLE<tab>I'll stay with the researchers. The creature, I leave to you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000790_GRAHATIA<tab>Come, Wuk Lamat!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000800_WUKLAMAT<tab>R-Right!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000810_WUKLAMAT<tab>Just so we're clear, I wasn't startled by the beast earlier. It caught me by surprise, that's all.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000820_GRAHATIA<tab>Forgive me, but I fail to see a difference.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000830_WUKLAMAT<tab>I-I'm getting hungry. Let's be done with this so we can eat!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000840_GIANTCOLIBRI<tab>Caught me by surprise! Caught me by surprise!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000850_WUKLAMAT<tab>Think you're clever, huh? I'll rip off that beak and roast you on a spit!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000860_WUKLAMAT<tab>Hmph, and I had barely limbered up.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000870_GRAHATIA<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000880_GRAHATIA<tab>It was a terrible foe, but no match for your axe.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000890_WUKLAMAT<tab>O-Only to be expected!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000900_WUKLAMAT<tab>You were pretty impressive yourselves. I was right to invite you on a hunt.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000910_WUKLAMAT<tab>But what a curious bird that was. Though we have similar in Tural, they don't grow so big or use such dirty tricks.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000920_GIANTCOLIBRI<tab>Dirty tricks! Dirty tricks!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000930_WUKLAMAT<tab>Aye, dirty and despicable. Otherwise I could have...easily...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000940_KRILE<tab>Leave this to me!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000950_KRILE<tab>Have at you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000960_GRAHATIA<tab>Krile?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000970_KRILE<tab>I am terribly, terribly sorry to have kept you all waiting!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000980_ERENVILLE<tab>She arrived as I was seeing the researchers to safety. It was all I could do to keep up with her after I explained what happened.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000990_GRAHATIA<tab>So this is what you meant by seeing to preparations.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001000_KRILE<tab>After hearing of the contest, I thought how wonderful it would be to join you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001010_KRILE<tab>In coming here, I wanted to demonstrate my skill at arms to Wuk Lamat. Alas, it seems I missed most of the action...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001020_WUKLAMAT<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001030_WUKLAMAT<tab>That was amazing! The beast didn't stand a chance!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001040_KRILE<tab>I'm glad to have been of service.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001050_GRAHATIA<tab>May I ask what inspired this change?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001060_KRILE<tab>You will recall the time you descended to the aetherial sea in search of Hydaelyn.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001070_KRILE<tab>Recognizing that my skills were inadequate, I chose to provide support from afar rather than join you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001080_KRILE<tab>It was the same when you set forth for Ultima Thule. How it pained me to stay behind, again and again...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001090_KRILE<tab>That's what inspired this change. Ever since the Final Days were averted, I've used every spare moment to hone my craft.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001100_KRILE<tab>As you all have adapted your methods to suit the circumstances, I started by considering how I might best contribute.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001110_KRILE<tab>And after much deliberation, I arrived at my answer...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001120_KRILE<tab>With the esoteric art passed down by the legendary Archon Relm─pictomancy.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001130_KRILE<tab>As I recall, you have embraced versatility to effectively complement a certain someone's style.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001140_KRILE<tab>What I do is much the same. Like you, I don't want to be left behind.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001150_GRAHATIA<tab>Indeed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001160_GRAHATIA<tab>I must say, you appear to be especially keen on being involved in the ritual of succession. Is there any particular reason?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001170_KRILE<tab>Yes, there is. This letter from Tuliyollal.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001180_KRILE<tab>It was addressed to my grandfather Galuf, and turned up among the Students' archives.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001190_KRILE<tab>The ink was faded so I couldn't fully make out the sender's name, a Gulool...someone.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001200_WUKLAMAT<tab>Ja Ja. Gulool Ja Ja. That's my father, the Dawnservant.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001210_WUKLAMAT<tab>What does the letter say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001220_KRILE<tab>While much of it isn't legible, it appears to be a request to investigate the golden city.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001230_ERENVILLE<tab>A request to investigate the golden city...from the Dawnservant himself?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001240_WUKLAMAT<tab>Well, well... Seems it may be more than a rumor after all.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001250_KRILE<tab>Being a member of the royal family, it was my hope that you could confirm the authenticity of this letter.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001260_WUKLAMAT<tab>I can say for a fact that my father didn't write this.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001270_WUKLAMAT<tab>Given how culturally diverse Tuliyollal is, it was decided some time ago that a common language was needed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001280_WUKLAMAT<tab>But instead of elevating an existing tongue, and its speakers, above all others, we looked to those widely spoken overseas and created an altogether new one.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001290_WUKLAMAT<tab>These similarities to your common tongue also make it quite easy to communicate in these situations, no?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001300_WUKLAMAT<tab>This letter, however, is entirely in Eorzean. If Father had written this, it would have been in Turali.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001310_WUKLAMAT<tab>What's more, it bears a wax seal. We don't bother with them.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001320_KRILE<tab>So the letter is fraudulent, then?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001330_WUKLAMAT<tab>Oh, I didn't mean to say that. My father's signature is genuine, as far as I can tell, so perhaps he simply dictated it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001340_KRILE<tab>I see... Thank you for the confirmation. It seems my grandfather indeed had dealings with Tuliyollal.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001350_KRILE<tab>I can't help but be curious as to what exactly he was doing there.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001360_KRILE<tab>In order to help us decide on a course of action, would you mind if I asked you some questions about your home?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001370_WUKLAMAT<tab>By all means.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001380_WUKLAMAT<tab>After all, learning about one another was the purpose of this hunt.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001390_WUKLAMAT<tab>We can talk while feasting on this fellow. I for one am starving!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001400_GRAHATIA<tab>We're eating...that?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001410_WUKLAMAT<tab>Come, come, let's enjoy the bounty of our first outing together!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001415_WUKLAMAT<tab>ハムッ……！
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001420_WUKLAMAT<tab>I'd heard that Sharlayan cuisine was terrible, but this is fantastic!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001430_ERENVILLE<tab>What is this? It smells...spicy.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001440_WUKLAMAT<tab>Oh come now, since when did you become so soft? It's not like we don't have spicy food in Tural too!

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001450_GRAHATIA<tab>According to Dickon, intensely hot dishes have become popular in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han after a traveler ordered a curry with several times the usual amount of spice.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001460_GRAHATIA<tab>So he started offering the same in order to please the growing Hannish population here in Sharlayan.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001470_WUKLAMAT<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001480_WUKLAMAT<tab>It's nothing...I can't handle!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001490_ERENVILLE<tab>Your boorish manners reflect poorly on the both of us. I wish you would consider your station...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001500_WUKLAMAT<tab>I swear, sometimes it feels like you open your mouth only to criticize.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001510_GRAHATIA<tab>Would I be correct in assuming you've known each other for a long time?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001520_WUKLAMAT<tab>Aye. Thick as thieves since we were little.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001530_ERENVILLE<tab>I beg to differ. She is a long-standing acquaintance, nothing more.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001535_GRAHATIA<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001540_GRAHATIA<tab>I see, I see...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001550_KRILE<tab>All this time, you were from Tural? Would that I had known sooner. There's so much I'd like to ask...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001560_ERENVILLE<tab>You and everyone else. I've kept it quiet so as to avoid the endless interrogations.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001570_WUKLAMAT<tab>Well, if he's going to be a miser, I'll be happy to tell you about our homeland instead.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001580_WUKLAMAT<tab>Since ancient times, many peoples have called Tural home, and they've been fighting each other for nearly as long.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001590_WUKLAMAT<tab>The fighting finally stopped some eighty years ago, when the reigning Dawnservant unified the disparate communities and founded a new nation.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001600_GRAHATIA<tab>And that's how Tuliyollal came to be...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001610_WUKLAMAT<tab>Since then, we've enjoyed an era of uninterrupted peace.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001620_WUKLAMAT<tab>But my father is getting old, and he wishes to relinquish the throne to a worthy successor─one who can preserve his legacy.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001630_WUKLAMAT<tab>Including myself, there are four claimants to the throne. But while we all have the right to participate, one among us cannot be allowed to rule.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001640_ERENVILLE<tab>A man who is too ambitious by half.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001650_ERENVILLE<tab>Word of the Garlean Empire's collapse has reached Tural.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001660_ERENVILLE<tab>While most are simply relieved, he sees weakness to exploit, and would lead our armies across the seas on a campaign of conquest.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001670_WUKLAMAT<tab>After everything my father has done to give us peace, he would drag us back into war.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001680_WUKLAMAT<tab>I can't allow it!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001690_WUKLAMAT<tab>No matter what, I must win this contest!

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001700_GRAHATIA<tab>I understand your reasons, but this being an event that will dictate the course of your nation's future, is it appropriate for outsiders like us to be involved?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001710_WUKLAMAT<tab>Oh, it's more than appropriate. The Dawnservant himself expressly encourages it.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001720_WUKLAMAT<tab>The ruler of Tural must navigate the intricacies of myriad cultures, and there's no better way to prove oneself qualified to do so than to work with foreign allies.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001730_WUKLAMAT<tab>That's why I sought you out. Through our hunt, I've confirmed that you're a warrior of considerable skill. But more importantly, one of good character as well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001740_WUKLAMAT<tab>And so I ask you: will you lend me your strength, and help me win the throne of Tuliyollal?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001750_WUKLAMAT<tab>You don't need to decide right this moment.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001760_WUKLAMAT<tab>But I will need you if I'm to triumph over the competition. I'll stay here as long as I can while waiting for your answer.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001770_KRILE<tab>In that case, allow us to prepare a room for you at the Baldesion Annex.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001780_WUKLAMAT<tab>That's very kind of you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001790_WUKLAMAT<tab>Oh, and one more thing... Once we've finished eating, would you mind if I took the rest of the meat?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001800_GRAHATIA<tab>Oh, it's just... Despite all that we've learned, I can't help but feel we've yet to hear the whole story...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001810_GRAHATIA<tab>What about you, my friend? Are you inclined to accept or refuse Wuk Lamat's request?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I never say no to a new adventure!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'm still undecided, to be honest.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'd rather not get involved in politics.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001820_GRAHATIA<tab>Hah, I thought you might say that.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001830_GRAHATIA<tab>With an intrepid attitude such as yours, I believe all shall be well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001840_GRAHATIA<tab>Be it the contest or something else, there will be many trials for you to overcome at your destination.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001850_GRAHATIA<tab>But in the course of seeing new lands and meeting new people, you'll surely find a way forward. That's what adventurers do, is it not?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001860_GRAHATIA<tab>I don't blame you. No matter the assurances, it's no simple thing to wade into the midst of a political struggle, and in a foreign land at that.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001870_GRAHATIA<tab>How about this, then. Instead of deciding here, go there first and then decide.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001880_GRAHATIA<tab>In the course of seeing new lands and meeting new people, you'll surely find a way forward.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001890_GRAHATIA<tab>That's what adventurers do, is it not?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001900_GRAHATIA<tab>If only others had the same good sense.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001910_GRAHATIA<tab>If the prospect troubles you so, why not consider what you stand to gain instead? That is, an exciting journey to a faraway continent.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001920_GRAHATIA<tab>In the course of seeing new lands and meeting new people, you might find yourself moved to help Wuk Lamat after all. And if not, well...you quietly take your leave.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001930_GRAHATIA<tab>A brazen plan, perhaps, but one that befits a veteran adventurer, you must agree!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001940_GRAHATIA<tab>Such a journey would be the envy of many a scholar. Distant as it is, Tural remains largely unknown to us, with only meager records to be found in Noumenon.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001950_GRAHATIA<tab>The experiences to be had─all the things you might hear, feel, and think... It's enough to stir me to the core.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001960_GRAHATIA<tab>Life is a series of journeys, my friend, and there's no telling what awaits us on the long road.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001970_GRAHATIA<tab>But what's important is to be true to yourself as you walk it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001980_GRAHATIA<tab>Only then can we hope to be content when we arrive at the end of one─and step forward into another.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001990_GRAHATIA<tab>Ah, but there's an idea!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002000_GRAHATIA<tab>I have a matter to attend to at the Agora. Please go on inside─I will join you shortly.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002010_WUKLAMAT<tab>You have the look of someone who's made up their mind. Go on then, let's hear it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I wish to boldly go where I've never gone before!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I've never been one to turn down an adventure. I'll do it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002020_WUKLAMAT<tab>Hmph. (REPORT IF DISPLAYED)
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002030_WUKLAMAT<tab>Then you need me as much as I need you. Together, we'll blaze new trails in Tural!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002040_WUKLAMAT<tab>Hmph. (REPORT IF DISPLAYED)
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002050_WUKLAMAT<tab>Excellent! You'll be compensated for your troubles, of course, but I daresay your time in Tural will be its own reward!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002060_ALISAIE<tab>You're not planning to leave without us, are you?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002070_KRILE<tab>Alphinaud! Alisaie! What are you two doing here?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002080_GRAHATIA<tab>We happened to cross paths at Noumenon earlier, you see, and I told them about Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002090_GRAHATIA<tab>And when we fortuitously met again at the Agora just now, they expressed an interest in meeting our visitor.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002100_WUKLAMAT<tab>Ah, you must be the twins who were sneaking after Erenville as toads!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002110_ALISAIE<tab>A hundred things about us you could have told her, and you chose that!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002120_ERENVILLE<tab>First impressions last.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002130_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Tis an honor and a pleasure to make your acquaintance, Your Highness. Alphinaud Leveilleur, at your service, and this is my sister, Alisaie.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002140_WUKLAMAT<tab>Oh, no, let's not do that. I really can't stand titles.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002150_WUKLAMAT<tab>So. You want to participate in the contest too, is that right?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed we do.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002170_ALPHINAUD<tab>We've been assisting with the rebuilding effort in Garlemald. Yet while progress is being made, the question remains of how the nation might reconcile with its neighbors.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002180_ALPHINAUD<tab>We believe there is much we might learn from Tuliyollal, a nation founded on unity. And in return for this honor, we would spare no effort in supporting your claim.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002190_WUKLAMAT<tab>The more the merrier, I say. And I'd be keen to learn about Eorzea and Garlemald from you as well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002200_ERENVILLE<tab>Having recruited so many committed and capable allies, I presume you have no need for my continued assistance.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002210_WUKLAMAT<tab>Nonsense! Like I told you before, you're indispensable.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002220_WUKLAMAT<tab>They're strong, aye, but strangers to our land. They need someone to guide them─to point out the dangers and spare them grisly deaths.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002230_WUKLAMAT<tab>I can't think of anyone better suited to that task than you. What's more, despite your assertions, I know you haven't given up on the city of gold.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002240_GRAHATIA<tab>As I recall, Krile, you were the first to state your desire to visit Tural.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002250_KRILE<tab>Perhaps I was...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002260_KRILE<tab>Still, I can't help but worry about being away just when our order is beginning to find its feet again.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002270_GRAHATIA<tab>You have nothing to worry about.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002280_GRAHATIA<tab>I haven't forgotten how you held the fort while I set off to explore Alzadaal's Legacy; it's only fair that I return the favor. Pray leave the Students to Ojika and me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002290_KRILE<tab>But Raha...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002300_GRAHATIA<tab>You want to retrace your grandfather's steps, don't you? This is a rare opportunity, and I insist that you seize it!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002310_KRILE<tab>Thank you, Raha. Thank you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002320_WUKLAMAT<tab>Well, looks like it's settled! I'm counting on you all to help me win the throne!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002330_GRAHATIA<tab>I suppose now is a good time to show you what I spent a small fortune on at the Agora.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002340_GRAHATIA<tab>There!

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002350_GRAHATIA<tab>This, my friends, is the latest map of the world, created to celebrate our friendship with the Loporrits. Cast your eyes west of Sharlayan, for there it lies...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002355_GRAHATIA<tab>The site of your next great adventure─Tural!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002360_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in Limsa Lominsa...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002370_ESTINIEN<tab>When does the next ship set sail?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002380_RHETKYMPF<tab>May I ask your destination?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002390_ESTINIEN<tab>The north and east, I've already seen...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002400_ESTINIEN<tab>I suppose I'll head west this time.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002410_RHETKYMPF<tab>“West,” you say...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002420_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in Old Sharlayan...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002430_THANCRED<tab>I see you've made up your mind. I had a feeling you'd be keen.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002440_URIANGER<tab>But to think that our comrades, too, are thither bound... Fate doth work in mysterious ways.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002450_URIANGER<tab>But to think that our comrades, too, are thither bound... Fate doth work in mysterious ways.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002460_THANCRED<tab>Indeed. It will be a grueling task, having to contend with them.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002470_URIANGER<tab>If the prospect doth trouble thee, 'tis not too late to decline the petition.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002480_URIANGER<tab>...Though thine expression would suggest thou art far from perturbed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002490_THANCRED<tab>Oh, how could I possibly be, knowing what's to come?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002495_URIANGER<tab>Hmph. (REPORT IF DISPLAYED)
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002500_URIANGER<tab>Then let us delay no further, and secure passage on a vessel.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002510_THANCRED<tab>Aye, this will be a mission to remember.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002520_THANCRED<tab>Come, my friend! We make for Tural!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002530_EMETSELCH<tab>(-Emet-Selch-)Tell me, have you been to the ruins beneath the waters of the Bounty?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002540_EMETSELCH<tab>(-Emet-Selch-)Or the treasure islands beyond the frozen waters of Blindfrost, in Othard's north?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002550_EMETSELCH<tab>(-Emet-Selch-)The fabled golden cities of the New World?
